Slaves are Meiyerditch citizens forced by the vampyres to excavate daeyalt ore in the daeyalt essence mine. They are nearly identical to the Meiyerditch miners excavating in the connected Meiyerditch mine.

v • d • e

'''Slaves''' are [[Meiyerditch]] citizens forced by the [[vampyres]] to excavate [[daeyalt ore]] in the [[daeyalt essence mine]]. They are nearly identical to the [[Meiyerditch miner]]s excavating in the connected [[Meiyerditch mine]].

{{Darkmeyer}}
